channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- Nextcloud Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- Nextcloud Server

item.title: CVE-2018-3776|2024-08-05T04:50:30.811Z -- hackerone -- nextcloud%20server
item.description: Improper input validator in Nextcloud Server prior to 12.0.3 and 11.0.5 could lead to an attacker's actions not being logged in the audit log.

item.title: CVE-2018-3775|2024-08-05T04:50:30.743Z -- hackerone -- nextcloud%20server
item.description: Improper Authentication in Nextcloud Server prior to version 12.0.3 would allow an attacker that obtained user credentials to bypass the 2 Factor Authentication.
